articles.title: AstraZeneca vaccine suspended: List of all 18 countries pressing pause - Business Insider
articles.description: The AstraZeneca vaccine has been suspended by Sweden, France, Germany, and 15 others, pending an investigation into potential side effects.
articles.content:
Multiple countries have paused the use of AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine as a precaution while investigators look into cases of blood clots among vaccinated people.
